a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Health of fish stocks by region
Fish stocks are measured by their biomass: the number of individuals multiplied by their mass. Here the biomass
of a fish stock is divided by the biomass at its maximum sustainable yield. A value of one maximizes fish catch
Data source: RAM Legacy Database; Hilborn,et al. (2020). Effective fisheries management instrumental in improving fish stock status.
